name: 2-Person CPR
warning: Only perform CPR if the person is unresponsive and not breathing. Coordinate with your partner.
emergency_notes: Switch roles every 2 minutes to prevent fatigue
One person does compressions, other does breaths

steps.title: Check Responsiveness
detailed_instructions: Confirm person is unresponsive and not breathing
steps.voice_prompt: First rescuer checks responsiveness. Second rescuer calls nine one one.

steps.title: Assign Roles
steps.description: Decide who does compressions and who does breaths
detailed_instructions: Other rescuer manages airway and breaths
Position on opposite sides of victim
steps.voice_prompt: Assign roles. Stronger person does compressions, other does rescue breaths.

steps.title: Compression Rescuer: Position Hands
steps.description: First rescuer positions hands on chest center
detailed_instructions: Place heel of one hand on center of chest
steps.voice_prompt: Compression rescuer: position hands on center of chest.

steps.title: Perform 30 Compressions
steps.voice_prompt: First rescuer: perform 30 compressions. Count out loud.
steps.critical_warning: Count out loud so partner knows when to give breaths

steps.title: Give 2 Rescue Breaths
detailed_instructions: Tilt head back to open airway
steps.voice_prompt: Second rescuer: give 2 rescue breaths while partner pauses compressions.

steps.title: Continue Cycle and Switch
steps.description: Repeat cycle and switch roles every 2 minutes
steps.voice_prompt: Continue the cycle. Switch roles every 2 minutes to prevent fatigue.
steps.critical_warning: Quick switches minimize interruptions to chest compressions
